Answer: I have a technical background and used to be a techie at Oracle Corporation. This is my fourth year in EY, and I work as part of the Advisory (consulting) service line. EY has a very good IT Advisory and IT Risk Assurance practice, which fall under the 'performance improvement' sub-service line in Advisory. I don't think I've felt out of place in the last four years and have been a part of many technology related consulting engagements. Technology experience and skills are highly valued within he firm.
